example.text: The attacks on the abortion pill are a concerted effort by anti-choice extremists to limit women's reproductive freedom, and we can't stand for it. I joined my [[user]] colleagues on an amicus brief urging the Fifth Circuit to reject these far-right, extreme attacks on women. [[url]]

Our law enforcement officers keep Nevadans safe, and I’ve always fought to deliver the resources they need. That’s why I’m proud to reintroduce the bipartisan Invest to Protect Act that will help make sure officers have the support they need to protect our communities. [[url]]

If you have any questions regarding any of the above information, or about applying for federal grants more generally, please do not hesitate to reach out to my Grants Director at grants@ . I said what I said. Stop playing games with our military [[user]]. [[url]]
